name: [BURNOUTS] (Starman Blue build)
description:
(THIS BUILD IS FREE! FEEL NO OBLIGATION TO DONATE!)

Inspired by Games and Series like Earthbound, FLCL, Psychonauts and LISA, this game takes place inside of the mind of people around you! Featuring 2 playable characters with slightly varying paths/stories and differing combat mechanics, and an interesting cast of enemies!

Game still in early development but join the Discord if you'd like to see more!

                          

DISCORD

Features

  • Differing combat mechanics for each party member!
  • Funny and charming yet dark plot/setting!
  • Differing story moments between the 2 main characters for multiple playthroughs!
  • Exportable save files between versions!
  • An original soundtrack!
  • Decisions carrying over and affecting character interactions! (Currently only lightly implemented in New Game+)
  • Unique levels and Enemies!
  • Mother 3/Oddity style sprite work!
  • Making you a generally hotter and better person! (DISCLAIMER: Playing [Burnouts] not actually guaranteed to make you hotter and better, just in my eyes ;( )
